    _ For the further ſatisfaction of the Curious in this Noble Art of Painting, it is thought not improper to ſubjoin the Character of ſome Italians and others, whoſe names no leſs deſerve to be inrolled in the Book of Fame. And becauſe their extraordinary merits challenge an account ſomething larger then ordinary, it is therefore our Deſign to ſelect only ſome few of the most eminent amonſt them, leſt theſe ſheets ſhould ſwell to too big a Bulk, or the Reader be tired with too great Abundance.

    _ For the further ſatisfaction of the Curious in this Noble Art of Painting, it is thought not improper to ſubjoin the Character of ſome Italians and others, whoſe names no leſs deſerve to be inrolled in the Book of Fame. And becauſe their extraordinary merits challenge an account ſomething larger then ordinary, it is therefore our Deſign to ſelect only ſome few of the most eminent amonſt them, leſt theſe ſheets ſhould ſwell to too big a Bulk, or the Reader be tired with too great Abundance.
